name: Traumatic Diaphragmatic Hernia
chief_complaint: Severe chest and abdominal pain after a car accident
physical_findings: decreased breath sounds on left side
prognosis: Good with prompt surgical intervention, but risk of complications if delayed
description: A tear in the diaphragm allowing abdominal organs to herniate into the thoracic cavity, typically caused by blunt trauma. Often missed initially due to other obvious injuries.
